title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and chat with 70+ GGUF models locally via a simple REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API—chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; supports RAG, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem exposing Ollama endpoints with native Ruby objects and streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that adds conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that uses Ollama for both generative and embedding nodes in pipelines.

title: ollama-cord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama for Phoenix LiveView chat demos with GenServer back-pressure.

title: ollama-sdks
summary: Meta-repo listing all first-party and community SDKs across languages.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Lightweight Qt6 desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that exposes Ollama as a provider with Swagger docs and DTO validation.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain in a single Docker Compose stack.

title: ollama-distro
summary: Community builds of Ollama for Alpine, ARM64, and RISC-V with musl libc patches.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of Modelfile recipes for Llama-3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.
